item.description:
PLEASE BE ADVISED THAT TOMORROW'S KARAOKE SHOW @ THE CORNER POCKET HAS BEEN CANCELLED.   This will be for THIS SATURDAY NIGHT ( Aug. 13th 2011 ) ONLY !  We will have karaoke NEXT Saturday evening (Aug. 20th 2011) AS USUAL beginning at 9:30PM.  Thank You All...

The Corner Pocket, 501 Boston Post Rd (Liberty Square), Orange CT 06477 Who likes to drink, eat a lil' something, perhaps play some pool, drink some more I'll have all of my stuff (you know the songs you like to sing) and to add a touch of nostalgia, The lovely Kerrie will be tending bar for us as well. Jim Mac Donald (aka The Karaoke Pimp) End of quote with some editing. Remember: food and/or drinks are required for singing! http://www.myspace.com/thecornerpocketcafe www.myspace.com/thecornerpocketcafe
item.how_to_find_us: Jim, KJ, is POC for this Meet Up

group.name: Karaoke Lovers of Greater New Haven .

item.name: Karaoke @ Corner Pocket Cafe with karaokepmp
